title: Reader's amazing car drawings, Audi's new RS4 Avant - Top motoring stories of the day
text:
Garth Cupido of Wellington combined his passion for cars and drawing with some really cool nostalgic rides including his former pride and joy, an Opel Kadett Superboss.

Babette Kourelos is a qualified lawyer but found her passion elsewhere, by baking bread. Datsun is no stranger to local businesses and fully supports her entrepreneurial dream.

In case you missed it

Take a trip down memory lane, 1955 to be exact, as a 64-year old Land Rover Defender Series I used by a group of graduates, travel from London to Singapore.

READ: Step back Picasso! This reader's passion for drawing cars is awe-inspiring

Audi is also making cosmetic changes to their 2020 RS4 Avant, making the estate as meaner as ever.

Electric vehicles are becoming popular choices for motorists, this coming in the midst of a drop in car sales and a massive 377.5% increase of emission-free engines.

description: A Wheels24 reader shares his car drawings with us and Audi is also making cosmetic changes to their 2020 RS4 Avant, making the estate as meaner as ever. Here are your top stories of the day.
